util.patrones.Random

    Package Description
    util.patrones  

    • Uses of Random in util.patrones

      Classes in util.patrones that implement Random 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Random.SystemRandom
      A Random that wraps a java.util.Random.
      Methods in util.patrones that return Random 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Random Random.Util.fromSystemRandom(java.util.Random rand)
      Adapts a java.util.Random into a Random.
      static Random Random.Util.newDefaultRandom()
      Creates a new Random based off the default system Random.
      Constructors in util.patrones with parameters of type Random 
      Constructor and Description
      ReservoirSampler(int numSamples, Random random)
      Create a new sampler with a certain reservoir size using a supplied random number generator.
